headline: DAT thanks truck drivers with free BBQ and giveaways Sept. 15-16
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., September 11, 2025--DAT Freight & Analytics will host free Driver Appreciation BBQ events on September 15 and 16 to thank truckers for keeping America moving:
